content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y1)

### Iron plate factory at position (z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b1) that connects the furnace at position x1 to assembling machine at position z1

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position c1)
- Inserter (position d1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position e1) that connects the iron plate factory to the assembling machine at position c1

### Copper cable factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position f1)
- Inserter (position g1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position h1) that connects the copper plate mine to the assembling machine at position f1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items without sufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires both iron plates and iron gear wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Always check the furnace inventory after performing actions to ensure that the expected items are present.
